productDescription: Stay warm with the knitted THUTMOSIS beanie. The ribbed design and tight fit provides warmth that lasts the entire day and goes with almost any look or outfit. The relaxed look radiates pure, easy-going masculanity.

optionalInfo.care: Wash (40 degrees max), Tumbling drying optional.
optionalInfo.production: We work in certified production facilities in Europe (Germany) to ensure fair and sustainable production and to prevent child labor.
optionalInfo.additionalNotes: Delivery in the Netherlands will take 1-3 days, to EU countries it will take between 3-5 days (on average).
